summary: Feature request to add dynamic signal and query handler registration in TypeScript SDK workflows, enabling DSL creation and high-level abstractions like awaitable Signal objects during workflow execution.
userImpact: Enables developers to build DSLs and high-level abstractions on top of Temporal by dynamically registering signal and query handlers during workflow execution.
proposedFix: Expose registerSignalHandler and registerQueryHandler functions in the @temporalio/workflow module to allow dynamic handler registration.
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented - dynamic handler registration is now supported in the SDK.
keyQuote: This is useful for building DSLs on top of Temporal and can enable high level abstractions such as an awaitable Signal object
